home.name: Iqbolshoh
home.title: Full-Stack Developer
home.description: A passionate Full-Stack Developer based in Samarkand. With over 3 years of experience in Laravel, React, and Node.js, I build modern and efficient digital solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who am I?
about.description: My name is Iqbolshoh Ilhomjonov, a 3rd-year Software Engineering student at Samarkand State University. I specialize in full-stack development and love solving real-world problems with code.
about.subDescription: Born in Uzbekistan, raised in Samarkand. I believe in continuous learning and align my journey with Islamic values and discipline.
about.journeyDescription: The path that led me here
about.mentoringDesc: Helping junior developers grow and learn new skills
about.openSourceDesc: Contributing to the developer community through shared projects
about.ethicalTechDesc: Building technology that serves humanity and aligns with my values

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: A collection of projects that showcase my skills in full-stack development, from simple websites to complex SaaS platforms.
portfolio.letsDiscuss: Let's discuss your next project and make it happen.
portfolio.noProjects: No projects found for this category

services.title: My Services
services.description: Professional web development services tailored to bring your ideas to life. From concept to deployment, I've got you covered.
services.howIWorkDescription: My proven process for delivering excellent results

blog.title: My Blog
blog.description: Sharing what I learn, build, and believe in. From technical tutorials to career insights and personal reflections on the developer journey.
blog.recentThoughts: Here are some of my recent thoughts and insights.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Got a project in mind or just want to say Salaam? I'd love to hear from you. Let's create something amazing together.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.getInTouchDesc: I'm always excited to work on new projects and collaborate with great people. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat, feel free to reach out!
contact.quickResponseDesc: I typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. For urgent projects, feel free to call or message me directly.
contact.basedInDesc: Located in the historic city of Samarkand, Uzbekistan. Available for remote work worldwide and local meetings in Samarkand.

footer.description: Creating digital solutions with passion. Let's bring your ideas to life.
